author: Paul Edwards
title: Cricket's glorious treasure house can sustain us in perilous times
description: There are more important innings to be played right now, but memories of the game will provide comfort for many | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: The April issue of The Cricketer arrived last week. Folded within was the annual wallchart presenting the fixtures for a season which will begin three months late at best. By September that multicoloured graphic is normally frail as medieval parchment; I doub… [+6007 chars]
